TABLE.NAME: workshepcalibration_examples
TABLE.COMMENT: Settings for the calibration subplugin Examples.

FIELD.NAME: comparison
FIELD.COMMENT: Here we store the recently set factor of comparison of assessment in the given workshep. Reasonable values are from 1 to 9. Default to 5.

FIELD.NAME: consistency
FIELD.COMMENT: Here we store the recently set factor of consistiency of assessment accuracy. Values are from 1 to 9.

KEY.NAME: fkuq_workshep
KEY.COMMENT: Every workshep can have only one settings record
